extendedInfo.description: ââTHE BEST & THE ORIGINAL Tower Defense on Google Play Store!âââSILVER AWARD Winner by Pocket Gamer!âYou may have played other âTDâ games but get ready to play THE TOWER DEFENSE! In search of resources that are no longer provided on Earth, you followed a probe released by humans years ago in hopes of discovering an alternative planet. Take command of towers with special weapons to hold your defense against endless waves of enemies on the hostile alien planet. Tower Defense takes classic defense games to a whole new world. ### FEATURES +40 campaign and 7 Challenge maps +4 different game play modes +9 Towers +10 Enemy units +4 Special Weapons +5 Different World Themes (Mountains, Desert, Ice, Crater, Lava) + This game supports English, franÃ§ais, Deutsch, íê¸, ä¸­æç®ä½, ä¸­æç¹é« and æ¥æ¬èª.ââââââââââââââââCom2uS: Your first search for fun!Check out these other exciting games by Com2uS!âââââââââââââââGolf Starâ¢: Experience the most vivid game of golf ever!Tiny Pop: A new super exciting bubble shooter!9 Innings: 2013 Pro Baseball: The Ultimate Baseball game!Tiny Farm: A Tiny Farm right in the palm of your hands!Heroes Warâ¢: Assemble the ultimate force of heroes to save the world!Other fun and exciting games are available, too!ââââââââââââââââPLAY WITH Com2uS!!ââââââââââââââââFollow us!twitter.com/Com2uSLike us on Facebook!facebook.com/Com2uSTips and Updateswww.com2us.com

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Really fun and simple and runs beautifully on my ace 2 X. Easy 5/5
reviews.author: Kyle Chouinard

reviews.title: I love this game it its super fun and never freezes up on me
reviews.comment: Good game..i love plaYing it

reviews.title: Pay to win aspect
reviews.comment: You can not beat some levels without diamonds to buy powerups and you don\'t earn enough for them. Games like this could be so much better yet fall flat with the give us your money for a better experience.
reviews.author: Mike Henderson

reviews.title: Good, fun, and excellent
reviews.comment: Everything is nice about the game & above average for a tower defense game so for a person who has a interest in tower defense games I recommend to get this game
reviews.author: Anthony Galvez

reviews.title: The game is good and fun
reviews.comment: Hello this game to me is kinda fun as it keeps you occupied trying to beat the level and strategically place the towers but could you make getting the diamonds easier as we are not getting enough of it and some level are difficult without the powerup.
reviews.author: zaki Buddy

reviews.title: Perfect Tower Defense
reviews.comment: I really LOVE the game! It is one of the best tower defense games out there. I just wish you could upgrade the separate towers. The game is totally addicting!!
reviews.author: Max Hillebrand

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Its fun n fantastic  Can be relaxing n have fun
reviews.author: Joshua bweh

reviews.title: Trully the best
reviews.comment: Very fun and enjoyable. Unlimited replay value
reviews.author: TJ O

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: I would give it a 5 since this game totally deserved it. But I have an issue with the game menu when upgrading or adding buffs to your game. I couldn\'t add/removes modifiers and after buying stuff diamond wouldn\'t change (yay). What actually happened was that the diamonds were deduced and the I was adding and removing modifiers, but for some reason it wouldn\'t show that until the next mission. Overall, one of the best TD games and I recommend it.
reviews.author: Ehsan Karamad

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: A good game, its pretty entrusting for hours. It has good graphics, could do with a little but more customization with the towers
reviews.author: Brandon Knudsen

reviews.title: Very good !
reviews.comment: One of the better TD games ive played. Easy to play, the game itself gives a decent challenge even on easy mode.
reviews.author: Yeti Harman

reviews.title: TD <3
reviews.comment: Simple, smooth, easy, reliable, fun x3
reviews.author: Cameron Prior

reviews.title: Super game lots of fun
reviews.comment: Super game loved it better than other games I\'ve played addicting and fun
reviews.author: James Kendrick

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: This game is awesome. Its not too easy and not hard enough to make you buy in game credits. I like that this game is visually appealing unlike other TD games. Good job. Where is the expansion?
reviews.author: Matt G

reviews.title: Second best tower defense game I\'ve played,
reviews.comment: Runs fine on nexus 7 and I can see from 1st few lvls its well put together and fun to play.
reviews.author: Adam Hawthorne

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: i dont know if its just my phone(samsung galaxy ace) but every time i play this game for a few minutes my battery is almost empty. i need to plug my phone everytime i play this game :)  still a 5 star for this game.
reviews.author: Tabelin JM

reviews.title: Better than Crystal Defenders O.o
reviews.comment: WOW I played crystal defenders on PSP , But this is even better. Better system of those defenders, better scenarios, and it is even free. AWESOME.
reviews.author: Darth Kristi\303\241n Romanec

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.comment: Excellent game, and free? Too awesome. Wonderful graphics and fun gameplay.
reviews.author: Ray Watson

reviews.comment: Great sound effects, responsive options, and works well on even cheap phones.\tWish there were more boobies
reviews.author: Contentum Absurdum

reviews.title: Great Tower Defence
reviews.comment: Nice graphics, smooth gameplay, great sound. All round awesome.
reviews.author: Ben Melluish
